Articles.Content:
Hello everybody I made a nice and small ssto which I will show here.

The s.s.s.s is super small ssto spaceplane

The s.s.s.s is able to easily get into LKO and have quite a nice fuel left for obrital stuff, and then deobit home.

The s.s.s.s have no landing gears, it use landing legs and parachute.

The s.s.s.s main target is to be a fast and fun way to get LKO and then you can dock, change orbits or even if you got some space station get to mun and ect...

But for this target i sujest using the pankace (other ssto)

Also, this ssto have only 38 part and looks good.

other details:

pre-launch mass: 3.75 t

parts: 38

owner manual:

action groups:

1) toggle jet

2) toggle rocket

3) toggle intakes 1

4) toggle intakes 2

5) toggle intakes 3

6) toggle all intakes

abort) open parachute

flight profile

1) on launch press on the gears button for landing legs to open

2) press 1 for jet, takeoff and go 10000 60 degrees

3) then go 15 until 17000

4) then 5-10 until you got your apoaps starting to clime fast, then burn horizontally.

5) when slowly torrte down when theres no air, try to sqeeze as much as you can from the jet

6) turn of intakes (6)

7) in the apopsis burn rockets to sircolize, now you are in orbit

this plane is very strong so the apopsis should be around 150 km just from jets.

download: http://speedy.sh/KFsdW/s-s-s-s.craft

more pictures:

have a nice fight
A very simple and elegant design. I like it

A very simple and elegant design. I like it

Agreed... I'm definitely going to try this one out.
